definitions.definition: have enough money to pay for.
examples: the best that I could afford was a first-floor room
synonyms: spare the price of "I can't afford a new car"

definitions.definition: have (a certain amount of something, especially money or time) available or to spare.
examples: it was taking up more time than he could afford

definitions.definition: be able to do something without risk of adverse consequences.
examples: kings could afford to be wrathful

definitions.definition: provide or supply (an opportunity or facility).
examples: the rooftop terrace affords beautiful views
synonyms: yield "the rooftop terrace affords beautiful views"
